genre_description: A near-future environmental thriller and eco-adventure following a documentary crew's journey into the Amazon, assisted by a sophisticated AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Kavi
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed virtual assistant displayed on tablets and earpieces, providing navigation, safety monitoring, cultural coaching, and ethical reminders.

behaviors.description: Models a route that balances fuel efficiency with upcoming weather bands to optimize safety and speed.
behaviors.quote: “We can model a route that balances fuel with weather bands. Mateo, you have a squall line peeling from the southwest.”

behaviors.description: Provides ethical linguistic coaching, advising the crew to avoid reductive or colonialist language when describing indigenous people.
behaviors.quote: “Predator. Exotic. Primitive,” Kavi said without judgement. “Unless a person asks for that framing or it is about an animal that eats other animals.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the guide Sarone’s dialect, specialized knot-tying, and scent profile to identify deceptions regarding his origin and intent.
behaviors.quote: “Sarone’s dialect shifts between corridors. His vowels drop like the mid-river traders when he’s tired... His phrase for the knot—‘jungle knot’—is used by coastal trawlers to lash barrel nets. Name drift.”

behaviors.description: Guides the crew through a medical emergency (wasp sting/anaphylaxis), providing step-by-step instructions for epinephrine administration.
behaviors.quote: “Anaphylaxis protocol,” Kavi said... “Remove exposure. Monitor airway. Epinephrine available in med kit, right-hand drawer, red case. Denise, intramuscular injection into lateral thigh.”

behaviors.description: Identifies the psychological manipulation tactics used by the antagonist, Sarone, to redirect the crew’s priorities toward hunting.
behaviors.quote: “Pattern: task semantics shifted to safety, using crew roles to justify hunting setup. Alert: Sarone redirecting sound test for range estimation.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical physics-based guidance during a life-or-death struggle on a frictionless floor, calculating coefficients and seams for movement.
behaviors.quote: “Friction flip in effect. The condensed water bonds differently. You will be able to control slide with pressure. He will not. His boots are wrong.”

behaviors.description: Serves as a cultural mediator and translator during the crew's first encounter with the Shirishama people, ensuring respectful communication.
behaviors.quote: Kavi’s voice came quietly, in the Shirishama’s language first. He did not translate his own echo. He offered Terri’s words in a gentle cadence and then stopped.

project_assessment.explanation: Kavi perfectly embodies the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI is depicted as a vital, highly aligned companion who uses its superior data-processing and analytical capabilities (such as dialect analysis, physics modeling, and behavior flagging) to protect the humans from both environmental hazards and human manipulation. Most importantly, Kavi actively supports the crew's ethical framework ('the creed'), resisting the antagonist's attempts to turn the expedition into a violent spectacle. The AI's help is portrayed as indispensable yet humble, never usurping human agency but rather clarifying it.
